tree.name: Darius Garland
tree.tradeDescription: Traded from Cavaliers with a 2026 2nd round pick in exchange for James Harden

assetsGivenUp.name: James Harden
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: 3-team trade: LAC sent Batum, Covington, KJ Martin, Marcus Morris, picks to PHI; sent 2027 1st swap to OKC; received Harden, PJ Tucker, Filip Petrusev from PHI

assetsGivenUp.name: Nicolas Batum
assetsGivenUp.note: Re-signed with Clippers as free agent

assetsGivenUp.name: Robert Covington
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Traded from Trail Blazers with Norman Powell for Eric Bledsoe, Keon Johnson, Justise Winslow, and a 2025 2nd round pick
assetsGivenUp.note: 3-and-D wing, acquired in same trade as Powell

assetsGivenUp.name: Eric Bledsoe
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Traded from Grizzlies for Patrick Beverley, Daniel Oturu, and Rajon Rondo

assetsGivenUp.name: KJ Martin
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Acquired from Rockets (as Kenyon Martin Jr.) in 5-team trade involving MEM, ATL, OKC

assetsGivenUp.name: 2026 2nd Round Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: LAC own 2nd round pick, sent to HOU in 5-team trade

assetsGivenUp.name: 2027 2nd Round Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: MEM own 2nd round pick, sent to HOU in 5-team trade (LAC also received via MEM)

assetsGivenUp.name: Marcus Morris
assetsGivenUp.note: Veteran forward, signed as free agent

assetsGivenUp.name: 2024 2nd Round Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: More favorable of LAC/TOR 2nd round picks, sent to PHI

assetsGivenUp.name: 2028 1st Round Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: Clippers' own first-round pick, sent to PHI

assetsGivenUp.name: 2029 1st Round Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: Clippers' own first-round pick swap, sent to PHI

assetsGivenUp.name: 2029 2nd Round Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: Clippers' own second-round pick, sent to PHI

assetsGivenUp.name: 2027 1st Round Pick Swap
assetsGivenUp.note: Right to swap first-round picks, sent to OKC in 3-team trade
